sections.title: System Name
sections.content: Identifies the official name and assigned number of the system that collects and maintains personally identifiable information.

sections.title: Security Classification
sections.content: Specifies the system’s security classification level, typically marked as 'None' for HHS systems not involving national security.

sections.title: System Location
sections.content: Lists the physical or network locations where system records are stored and maintained.

sections.title: Categories of Individuals Covered by the System
sections.content: Describes the groups of individuals whose information is collected and maintained in the system.

sections.title: Categories of Records in the System
sections.content: Summarizes the types of personal or identifying data stored within the system, such as contact or health information.

sections.title: Authority for Maintenance of the System
sections.content: Cites the legal authority, statute, or executive order that authorizes the collection and maintenance of the records.

sections.title: Purpose(s)
sections.content: Defines the purpose of the system and explains how collected information supports internal departmental functions.

sections.title: Routine Uses of Records Maintained in the System
sections.content: Outlines authorized external disclosures, identifying recipients, types of information shared, and their intended use.

sections.title: Policies and Practices for Storing, Retrieving, Accessing, Retaining, and Disposing of Records

subsections.title: Storage
subsections.content: Explains the formats or media used to store system records, such as databases, files, or magnetic storage.

subsections.title: Retrievability
subsections.content: Describes how records are retrieved, for example by name, Social Security number, or unique identifier.

subsections.title: Safeguards
subsections.content: Summarizes physical and technical measures that protect data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

subsections.title: Retention and Disposal
subsections.content: Specifies how long records are retained and outlines disposal methods in accordance with federal record policies.

subsections.title: System Manager(s) and Address
subsections.content: Identifies the office or official responsible for managing the system’s policies and practices.

subsections.title: Notification Procedure
subsections.content: Describes how individuals can inquire whether their records are included in the system.

subsections.title: Record Access Procedures
subsections.content: Explains how individuals can request access to their records and verify their identity for retrieval.

subsections.title: Contesting Record Procedures
subsections.content: Outlines how individuals can request corrections or deletions of inaccurate or outdated records.

subsections.title: Record Source Categories
subsections.content: Identifies where records originate, including internal sources, individuals, or external agencies.

subsections.title: Systems Exempted from Certain Provisions of the Act
subsections.content: Specifies any Privacy Act exemptions and describes which types of records are exempt from access.

sections.title: Appendix A: System of Records Approval
sections.content: Documents the approval and signatures of responsible officials confirming review and acceptance of the system of records notice.

sections.title: Appendix B: References
sections.content: Lists all referenced documents, versions, descriptions, and storage locations related to the system notice.

sections.title: Appendix C: Key Terms
sections.content: Defines key terms and acronyms used in the System of Records Notice.
